thread.title_full: Enjoyed a couple of days in the center of things - Review of Millennium Broadway New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 479casimirk
title: Enjoyed a couple of days in the center of things
text: Good hotel in the heart of Broadway - mid-range in price and convenient to everything Mid-Town. Friendly and efficient front desk, clean and reasonable rates for the location. Can eat out and enjoy NYC sights and attractions.
